title: bullrun2024bro
author: bullrun2024bro
content: Hi everyone,I need a small sum of Ethereum (less than $100). I would send you the same amount in Bitcoin + a small fee for your efforts. Please no newbie accounts. I would go first with trusted accounts, otherwise you go first.Post here or send me a PM.bullrun2020bro

comments.author: jbdee
comments.body: Hi, are you including the ETH transfer fee too when you say the "same amount in Bitcoin"?

comments.author: bananaunana
comments.body: Quote from: bullrun2020bro on June 03, 2023, 09:14:45 PMAlready solved. Can be closed.You can lock a topic yourself. Lower-left corner of each topic, next to move topic, it's also possible to lock a topic for OP.

comments.author: bullrun2024bro
comments.body: Quote from: bananaunana on June 03, 2023, 11:21:40 PMLower-left corner of each topic, next to move topic, it's also possible to lock a topic for OP. I will leave it open for a while. I might need some ETH in the future, you never know.
